mapper.update: update cs_update_infos set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, templete_info_xml = #{templeteInfoXml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, created_at, updated_at, customer_id, apply_num, templete_info_xml from cs_update_infos where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
